title: Savvy shopper bags £120 of Yankee Candles for just 50p at B&M
text:

A super-savvy shopper has managed to pick up an astonishing £119.95 worth of Yankee Candles for just 50p in B&M.

Sharing her find on Facebook to share the find, the woman explained she found the Belgian Waffle Yankee Candle for just 10p each in B&M.

That's an incredible discount on the £23.99 retail price - so she grabbed five of them.

She might even have got more - but after that the shelf was bare.

"Bought five in total £100 in Yankee candles for 50p and yes cleared shelf as there was only five," she wrote on Facebook.

(Image: Facebook)

The post has gone on to be liked thousands of times with hundreds of comments added underneath from highly impressed shoppers.

"Doesn't matter if there was five or 55 left on the shelf I would have cleared it at that price," one wrote.

"Well done on snapping up a fantastic bargain."

People were even making plans to follow her example and heading straight to their nearest store.

(Image: Facebook)

Another commented: "Brilliant! Hope my B&M have some. Great Christmas pressies!"

It's the best price we've seen, easily topping the discount that saw the shop list them for £3 last year.

The good news is that the more people buy, the more likely they are to be re-stocked again later - meaning by clearing the shelves she might just have given another shopper a chance to do the same in a few months.
description: After seeing the almost unbelievable bargain, the woman proceeded to clear the shelf - and absolutely no one blames her
